vote.title: Appointment of Michele A. Boni, Orange Township Offices, 1680 E Orange Road, Lewis Center, OH 43035,  to serve on the Rocky Fork-Blacklick Accord Panel, replacing Kimberly Burton, with a new term expiration date of June 9, 2024 (resume attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Appointment of Michele A. Boni, Orange Township Offices, 1680 E Orange Road, Lewis Center, OH 43035,  to serve on the Rocky Fork-Blacklick Accord Panel, replacing Kimberly Burton, with a new term expiration date of June 9, 2024 (resume attached).
